steps.name: uTASe

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Define the precise JSON request bodies, headers, and prompt structures required to interact with the https://ai.violass.club/v1 API for the specific tasks of joke generation, feedback analysis, and recommendation.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Develop a dedicated, reusable API client module within the Humor Evaluator system to handle all communications with the https://ai.violass.club/v1 endpoint, encapsulating logic for authentication, request sending, and response parsing.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Integrate the new API client by refactoring the existing joke generation, feedback analysis, and recommendation features, replacing all previous LLM calls with calls to the new module.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Design a simple and clear UI layout for displaying the API-generated jokes, the results of the feedback analysis, and the final recommendations, ensuring the flow is intuitive for the user.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Implement the UI designs from Aurora, connecting the front-end components to the backend services that now use the new API, ensuring data is displayed correctly.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Perform end-to-end testing on the integrated system to evaluate the quality of the API's output. Refine the prompts for joke generation, analysis, and recommendations based on test results to optimize performance and relevance.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Apply final code modifications based on Lyra's testing and prompt refinement feedback, addressing any bugs or performance issues to finalize the implementation.
